stories.text:
I'm playing around with a pet project of mine that is a static site generator written in Ruby. While the project itself is not important, what I'm curious about is what people need and look for when reading a README of a software project?

https://github.com/pusewicz/statique

I would love to hear your opinions and feedback in regards to the current state of the README.
stories.title: Ask HN: Readme and Getting Started Improvements

stories.text: Disclaimer: Not myself, but a good friend of mine is suffering from rapid vision degradation and will be fully blind within a few months. I want to do what I can to help them prepare. Anything from software and tool suggestions to general workflow and tips would all be very much appreciated, thanks!
stories.title: Ask HN: How to prepare as soon-to-be blind developer?
